opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 7th day of April, 2015, as it appears Appellant joined the settlement agreement, the appeal is dismissed as having been IMPROVIDENTLY GRANTED.
Chief Justice SAYLOR and Justice TODD did not participate in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Arthur W. Lefco, Esq., Marshall, Dennehey, Warner, Coleman & Goggin, P.C., Philadelphia, Francis X. O’Connor, Esq., Great Bend, James C. Sargent, Jr., Esq., Lamb McErlane, PC, West Chester, for Pennsylvania Bar Association, Amicus Curiae.
